topic.title: Physical Findings Of Skin Section - conformance rules

section.p: The Skin Physical Exam section includes direct observations made by the clinician. This section includes only observations made by the examining clinician using inspection and palpation; it does not include laboratory or imaging findings. The examination may be reported as a collection of random clinical statements or it may be reported categorically.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:29899, CONF:29901 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.62"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:29901)/@code="10206-1" Physical findings of Skin Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:29902, CONF:32150)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:29905, CONF:29906)
Conforms to Longitudinal Care Wound Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.114:2015-08-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:29901)/@code="10206-1" Physical findings of Skin Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:29902, CONF:32150)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:29905, CONF:29906)
Conforms to Longitudinal Care Wound Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.114:2015-08-01)
